doc.field: The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts
The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts

Nine editions, bound together (1): Neander, A.: I Sacrarum cantionum à4-8,10,12 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1605) RISM N308 (2): Neander, A.: II Sacrarum cantionum à4-8,10,12,14,24 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1605) RISM N309 (3): Neander, A.: III Sacrarum cantionum à4-8,10,12,14,24 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1606) RISM N310 (4): Bonhomme: Melodiae sacrae à5,6,8,9 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1605) RISM B3469 (5): Reiner, J.: Gloriosissimae Virginis ... Mariae canticum à8 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1604) RISM R1091 (6): Regnart: I Sacrarum cantionum à4-8,10,12 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1604) RISM R737 (7): Schramm: Cantiones selectae à5,6,8 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1606) RISM S2109 (8): Bendinello: I Sacrarum cantionum à4-5 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1604) RISM B1911 (9): Bendinello: II Sacrarum cantionum à5 (Frankfurt: Stein, 1604) RISM B1912=16044 One part-book, the Cantus, from a set of twelve
The Sabbateni Collection of Renaissance Music Manuscripts
